short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Append screenshots for failed test after stack trace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small Chrome extension for TeamCity to provide some additional functions to the user interface. Features * Show image published to artifacts after console log Extension parse test stdout command ##teamcity[publishArtifacts ''] and inject tag after stacktrace docs: https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCD18/Build+Script+Interaction+with+TeamCity#BuildScriptInteractionwithTeamCity-PublishingArtifactswhiletheBuildisStillinProgress v0.2.0 - Supprot for TeamCity v2020.1 v0.1.4 - Support for escaped symbols in artifact path - Added download links for all artifacts published in test v0.1.3 - Support for TeamCity 2018.1.1
